{
	TempClass a;

	TempClass c = a; // copy assignment operator

    class Uncopyable
{
	protected:
		Uncopyable() {}
		~Uncopyable() {}

	private:
		Uncopyable(const Uncopyable& other);
		Uncopyable& operator=(const Uncopyable& other);
};

class TempClass : private Uncopyable { ... };
